data.message: They say mon you mental with the pencil,you got the potential to be influential,spittin bars like benzo's,smoke you like endo,staring at your grave out my secret window,dont intend to play me like nintendo, bitch i got credentials,from grand theft auto to safe crackin with criminal utensils,fresh out the cocoon,howlin at the moon,writin runes,in the mental hospital seclusion room eattin lorna dunes,going crazy from the womb to the tomb,vicks glow sticks an nitrous baloons,i gaffle platoons baffle buffoon's,come drink from my spittoon,might be premature but the end is comin soon.

replies.message: This is dope. I'm a lyricist as well. This is the best I've seen on here 💯
